Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.description: Perform client side operations through client activities

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="logger.info("INFO: pb_status : [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status} + "]");

if (!xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status}.equals("COMPLETED"))
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS", "FAILED");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE", xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_failiure_message});
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_STATUS = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS") + "]");
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE") + "]");
}" /></inputs>

Activity.description: Deletes a client group
Activity.name: DeleteClientGroup

condition.script: (!xpath:{/workflow/ClientGroup_8/commandOutput}.contains(xpath:{/workflow/ForEach_8/client_group_list}) && xpath:{/workflow/DeleteClientGroup_1/system/status}.equals("COMPLETED"));
(xpath:{/workflow/ClientGroup_8/commandOutput}.contains(xpath:{/workflow/ForEach_8/client_group_list}) || !xpath:{/workflow/DeleteClientGroup_1/system/status}.equals("COMPLETED"));

condition.script: (xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DELETE_CLIENT_GROUP} && xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_DELETE_CLIENTGROUP_FAILED_LIST} != null && !xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_DELETE_CLIENTGROUP_FAILED_LIST}.isEmpty());

Activity.name: ExecuteProcessBlock

inputs.val: <inputs><inputs><pb_status class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">FAILED</pb_status><pb_failiure_message class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">Failed to delete Client Groups -> xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_DELETE_CLIENTGROUP_FAILED_LIST}</pb_failiure_message></inputs><processBlock>ProcessBlock_5</processBlock><outputs /></inputs>

Activity.description: Ends the workflow
Activity.name: WorkflowEnd

Activity.description: executes queries against a commcell database
Activity.displayName: Get client on which MA is not installed
Activity.name: CommServDBQuery

inputs.val:
<inputs><commCell /><query>select TOP 1 name from app_client where specialClientFlags = 0 and 
id not in (select ClientId from mmhost) and 
id !=2 order by id ASC</query></inputs>

Activity.description: executes queries against a commcell database
Activity.name: CommServDBQuery

inputs.val:
<inputs><commCell /><query>select a.name from simInstalledPackages as S 
INNER JOIN app_client as A ON A.id = S.ClientId
where S.simPackageID=51 and A.id not in (select DISTINCT ClientId from MMDeviceController)</query></inputs>

Activity.description: creates a super process group
Activity.name: ProcessBlock

Activity.description: iterates a group of activities over a list of values
Activity.name: ForEach

inputs.val:
<inputs><inputXml class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"><TMMsg_ClientReconfigurationReq>
<clientInfo>
<clientName/>
</clientInfo>
<appTypes>
<appName/>
</appTypes>
</TMMsg_ClientReconfigurationReq></inputXml><escapeXml class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</escapeXml><commandArgs class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">–clientName xpath:{/workflow/ForEach_9/pb_client_list}</commandArgs><sessionOptions class="workflow.types.cmd.SessionOptions" _list_="false"><useImpersonatedAccount class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</useImpersonatedAccount><tokenFile class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><token class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></sessionOptions></inputs>
